|brand = LG |model = TWFM-B003D |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = January 17, 2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/LG_TWFM-B003D |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = (non-standard connector) |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 043e |device_id = 3004 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = BEJTWFMB003D |icid = 2703H-TWFMB003D |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:1E:B2, 94:44:44
|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43236B;BCM43236BKMLG, HT1130 P21, 152207 6 W<!-- ;,,, BCM43236B;BCM43236BKMLG, HT1233 P21, 222496 6 W -->; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = 2.4/5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SE2577L;SiGe, 2577L, 232JW;2; |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/26/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Indonesia
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The cable colors for this device are backwards. :Red = GND, Black = 5V, Green = Data +, White = Data -
This device works quite well with '''brcmfmac''' after runtime device ID insertion <small>(modprobe brcmfmac; echo "043e 3004" > /sys/bus/usb/drivers/brcmfmac/new_id;)</small> - it's a 43236 rev. 3. Throughput is actually quite exceptional..
==Notes== {{/Additional info}}
[[Category:English Documentation]]
